page.title: 07A Typical Swallownest Family
page.content: The Smiths werent born in Swallownest, they moved here because of the low rates. They have 2 children are buying their semi-detached house & rarely go to Church. Their leisure time is spent in sport & gardening. They both like TV. He likes news & sport & she likes soap operas. There are two wage earners in the family. They both work in Sheffield, he in a skilled job & she in an unskilled job. They have been on holiday to Cornwall & abroad to Spain. They have a car & spend up to Â£10 per week on petrol. Mrs Smith spends 20p per week on bus fares. They prefer Asda supermarket for their food & Sheffield for non-food shopping. They sometimes have a drink in the pub, &, like many other people, do not smoke. They felt there was inadequate provision in Swallownest for teenagers.
